PService.name: ServiceQASchemaValidationTest

policy.name: Policy for service #3276801, ServiceQASchemaValidationTest
policy.xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wsp:Policy xmlns:L7p="http://www.layer7tech.com/ws/policy" xmlns:wsp="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2002/12/policy">
    <wsp:All wsp:Usage="Required">
        <L7p:SchemaValidation>
            <L7p:ResourceInfo staticResourceInfo="included">
                <L7p:Document stringValue="<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<s:schema elementFormDefault="qualified"
    targetNamespace="http://qaschematest.layer7.com/"
    xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tm="http://microsoft.com/wsdl/mime/textMatching/">
    <s:annotation>
        <s:documentation xml:lang="en">   This is a test schema for
            WebServiceForSchemaTest!  </s:documentation>
    </s:annotation>
    <s:element name="EchoName">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element name="inName">
                    <s:simpleType>
                        <s:restriction base="s:string">
                            <s:minLength value="15"/>
                            <s:maxLength value="30"/>
                            <s:pattern value="([a-z])*"/>
                        </s:restriction>
                    </s:simpleType>
                </s:element>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoNameResponse">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"
                    name="EchoNameResult" type="s:string"/>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoGenda">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element name="inGenda">
                    <s:simpleType>
                        <s:restriction base="s:string">
                            <s:pattern value="male|female"/>
                        </s:restriction>
                    </s:simpleType>
                </s:element>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoGendaResponse">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"
                    name="EchoGendaResult" type="s:string"/>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoAge">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element name="inAge">
                    <s:simpleType>
                        <s:restriction base="s:int">
                            <s:minInclusive value="29"/>
                            <s:maxInclusive value="47"/>
                            <s:totalDigits value="2"/>
                            <s:pattern value="[1-4][7-9]"/>
                        </s:restriction>
                    </s:simpleType>
                </s:element>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoAgeResponse">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"
                    name="EchoAgeResult" type="s:int"/>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoDateTimeBorn">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element name="inDateTimeBorn">
                    <s:simpleType>
                        <s:restriction base="s:dateTime">
                            <s:minInclusive value="2003-01-01T08:01:59.0000000-08:00"/>
                            <s:maxInclusive value="2007-01-01T08:01:59.0000000-08:00"/>
                            <s:pattern value="200[0-9]-0[1-8]-\d{2}T\d{2}:\d{2}:\d{2}.\d{7}-\d{2}:\d{2}"/>
                        </s:restriction>
                    </s:simpleType>
                </s:element>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoDateTimeBornResponse">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"
                    name="EchoDateTimeBornResult" type="s:dateTime"/>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoMarried">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element name="inMarried">
                    <s:simpleType>
                        <s:restriction base="s:boolean">
                            <s:pattern value="true|false"/>
                        </s:restriction>
                    </s:simpleType>
                </s:element>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoMarriedResponse">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"
                    name="EchoMarriedResult" type="s:boolean"/>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoHomeAddress">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"
                    name="inHomeAddress" type="s:string"/>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoHomeAddressResponse">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"
                    name="EchoHomeAddressResult" type="s:string"/>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoHomePhoneNumber">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"
                    name="inHomePhoneNumber" type="s:long"/>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoHomePhoneNumberResponse">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"
                    name="EchoHomePhoneNumberResult" type="s:long"/>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="Echo">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element name="inPerson">
                    <s:complexType>
                        <s:sequence>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="2" minOccurs="0"
                                name="Name" type="s:string"/>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"
                                name="Genda" type="s:string"/>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Age">
                                <s:simpleType>
                                    <s:restriction base="s:int">
                                    <s:minInclusive value="29"/>
                                    <s:maxInclusive value="47"/>
                                    <s:totalDigits value="2"/>
                                    <s:pattern value="[1-4][7-9]"/>
                                    </s:restriction>
                                </s:simpleType>
                            </s:element>
                            <s:element name="DateTimeBorn">
                                <s:simpleType>
                                    <s:restriction base="s:dateTime">
                                    <s:minInclusive value="2003-01-01T08:01:59.0000000-08:00"/>
                                    <s:maxInclusive value="2007-01-01T08:01:59.0000000-08:00"/>
                                    </s:restriction>
                                </s:simpleType>
                            </s:element>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Married">
                                <s:simpleType>
                                    <s:restriction base="s:boolean">
                                    <s:pattern value="([TFt][RAr][ULu][ESe])*"/>
                                    </s:restriction>
                                </s:simpleType>
                            </s:element>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"
                                name="HomeAddress" type="s:string"/>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"
                                name="HomePhoneNumber" type="s:long"/>
                        </s:sequence>
                    </s:complexType>
                </s:element>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
    <s:element name="EchoResponse">
        <s:complexType>
            <s:sequence>
                <s:element name="EchoResult">
                    <s:complexType>
                        <s:sequence>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="2" minOccurs="0"
                                name="Name" type="s:string"/>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"
                                name="Genda" type="s:string"/>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Age">
                                <s:simpleType>
                                    <s:restriction base="s:int">
                                    <s:minInclusive value="29"/>
                                    <s:maxInclusive value="47"/>
                                    <s:totalDigits value="2"/>
                                    <s:pattern value="[1-4][7-9]"/>
                                    </s:restriction>
                                </s:simpleType>
                            </s:element>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="DateTimeBorn">
                                <s:simpleType>
                                    <s:restriction base="s:dateTime">
                                    <s:minInclusive value="2003-01-01T08:01:59.0000000-08:00"/>
                                    <s:maxInclusive value="2007-01-01T08:01:59.0000000-08:00"/>
                                    </s:restriction>
                                </s:simpleType>
                            </s:element>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="Married">
                                <s:simpleType>
                                    <s:restriction base="s:boolean"/>
                                </s:simpleType>
                            </s:element>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0"
                                name="HomeAddress" type="s:string"/>
                            <s:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1"
                                name="HomePhoneNumber" type="s:long"/>
                        </s:sequence>
                    </s:complexType>
                </s:element>
            </s:sequence>
        </s:complexType>
    </s:element>
</s:schema>
"/>
            </L7p:ResourceInfo>
        </L7p:SchemaValidation>
        <L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
            <L7p:ProtectedServiceUrl stringValue="http://hugh/WebServiceForSchemaTest/Service1.asmx"/>
            <L7p:RequestHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="SOAPAction"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:RequestHeaderRules>
            <L7p:RequestParamRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included"/>
                <L7p:ForwardAll booleanValue="true"/>
            </L7p:RequestParamRules>
            <L7p:ResponseHeaderRules httpPassthroughRuleSet="included">
                <L7p:Rules httpPassthroughRules="included">
                    <L7p:item httpPassthroughRule="included">
                        <L7p:Name stringValue="Set-Cookie"/>
                    </L7p:item>
                </L7p:Rules>
            </L7p:ResponseHeaderRules>
        </L7p:HttpRoutingAssertion>
    </wsp:All>
</wsp:Policy>
